member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.ZipAssembly
member.summary: 将所有的模型数据都放置在同一个XML文件之中 会因为文件过大而难于调试 在这里进行元素的分块存储

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.ZipWriter
member.summary: An internal module for save the virtual cell model in zip archive format

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.Debugger
member.summary: Model file debugger

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.Debugger.checkModel(SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.VirtualCell,Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.Debugging.Logging.LogFile)
member.summary: this function is mainly address at check the errors in the virtual cell component networking.

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.ModelExtensions.CreateModel(SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.VirtualCell,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load model file as the unify data model for run the downstream simulation analysis.
member.remarks: (将所加载的XML模型文件转换为统一的数据模型)

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: 为了方便进行程序的调试，这个模块的对外依赖关系因该是很小的 因为这个模块主要是应用于定义文件的格式以及结构 为了减少依赖关系，模型的创建应该是放在compiler模型编译器模块之中

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.OperationExtensions.DeleteMutation(SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.VirtualCell,System.String[])
member.summary: 基因组之中的基因发生了缺失突变

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.OperationExtensions.Trim(SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.VirtualCell)
member.summary: 删除所有没有在当前的模型之中找到对应的酶的酶促反应过程 (不推荐使用这个操作，因为可以假设缺少酶的情况下，反应过程可以以非常低的效率进行，但是删除之后反应链将会完全断裂了)

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.gene
member.summary: the gene model

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.gene.locus_tag
member.summary: the gene id

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.gene.protein_id
member.summary: the corresponding ORF protein id, this will link to the metabolisom model

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.gene.product
member.summary: the protein function description

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.gene.strand
member.remarks: 因为字符类型在进行XML序列化的时候会被转换为ASCII代码，影响阅读 所以在这里使用字符串类型来解决这个问题

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.gene.amino_acid
member.summary: 对于rRNA和tRNA不存在
member.returns: composition vector of 22 kinds of AA residues, integer value in range from [1,n]

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.gene.nucleotide_base
member.summary: mRNA, tRNA, rRNA, etc
member.returns: composition vector of 4 RNA base ACGU, integer value in range from [1,n]

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.Genome.replicons
member.summary: 一个完整的基因组是由若干个复制子所构成的，复制子主要是指基因组和细菌的质粒基因组

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.Genome.regulations
member.summary: 转录调控网络
member.remarks: 如果这个基因组是由多个复制子构成的，那么在这里面会由染色体上面的调控因子和质粒上的 调控因子之间的相互调控作用网络的数据而构成

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.RNA
member.summary: 只记录tRNA，rRNA和其他RNA的数据，对于mRNA则不做记录

member.summary: the trranscription source template gene

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.RNA.type
member.summary: the rna type

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.GCModeller.Assembly.GCMarkupLanguage.v2.RNA.val
member.summary:
usually be the:
1. amino acid code for tRNA 2. 16s,5s,23s for rRNA
